content:
WorkflowDesignerColors Class

Definition

Enables colors and color gradients to be associated with aspects of the elements and shell bars used in the Windows Workflow Designer user interface.

In this Article

public static class WorkflowDesignerColors
Inheritance
System.Object
WorkflowDesignerColors

Specifies the beginning color key for the color gradient of the annotation background. This field is constant.
